useCase.name: Prioritize and Update Feature List
useCase.description: As a Team Member, I want to prioritize features based on defined criteria, update the backlog, and ensure technical and design feasibility.

preconditions.precondition: The feature backlog is accessible and has a list of proposed features.

successEndConditions.condition: The prioritized features list is updated with feasibility and design confirmations.

useCase.trigger: Team Member accesses the feature backlog.

mainSequence.step: Team Member accesses the feature backlog and lists proposed features.
Team Member reviews the listed features.
Team Member consults the prioritization criteria and understands the guidelines.
Team Member applies the criteria to the features.
Team Member consults with Designer regarding the filtered features.
Team Member consults with Engineer on technical feasibility.
Team Member updates the prioritized features list in the CMS/Backlog.
Team Member shares the prioritized features list with the Engineer and Designer.
Engineer updates technical details in the CMS.
Evaluation decisions received concerning the feature feasibility and design.
Finalize feature prioritization based on confirmation received.

asteps.step: Relevant team members re-evaluate and update priorities if there are feasibility or design issues.
